params._amounts: List of quota amounts for each ERC20 token

params._tokens: List of ERC20 tokens to be set

getQuota(address).details: Tell the quota information for a certain token
getQuota(address).return: period Periods length for the requested ERC20 token quotaamount Quota amount for the requested ERC20 token

getStartDate().details: Tell the start date of the faucet

getTotalSupply(address).details: Tell the total supply of the faucet for a certain ERC20 token
getTotalSupply(address).return: Total supply of the faucet for the requested ERC20 token

getWithdrawal(address,address).details: Tell the last period withdrawals of an ERC20 token for a certain account

params._account: Address of the account being queried

getWithdrawal(address,address).return: id ID of the last period when the requested account withdraw a certain amountamount Amount withdrawn by the requested account during the last period

params._amounts: List of quota amounts for each ERC20 token

params._tokens: List of ERC20 tokens to be set
